lore: Torture devices have long held a notorious reputation, used across countless generations all over the world. But as times changed, some nations officially outlawed their useâ€”at least on paper. This, of course, left behind a massive stockpile of now-obsolete instruments like the Iron Maiden. Rather than destroy them, places like Rodia decided to enchant them and put them to use: fighting on the front lines or patrolling rough neighborhoods to scare criminals into behaving.
menagerieDialog: I do not wish to speak to you right now. I would prefer to return to where I came from.
You would dare to rip me from my portal and summon me to this dying world? You have no shame.
I am bound to serve you, but know that it is not by choice.
I do not belong here in your filthy Menagerie. I deserve my own quarters in your castle!
Give me freedom, or give me death!
name: Iron Maiden
